Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I've been using this website for while for inspiration, mods and education! It's nice to be a part of the forum now.

I look forward to meeting as many of you as I can!

Cheers,

Mathew.

Welcome to the forums! (officially)

You'll meet quite a lot of people. There are a lot of us. Nice to meet you!
Let me be the second! I'll be glad to see you around. Let's see... There's some cake over here, we have some beverages in the fridge, some chips, it's gonna be a good time.
Nice to meet you guys. I'll be taking some of that cake ;D
Has nodoby told you guys that the cake is a lie? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
